main event: Ground observation of unusual vapor trails and an oval shaped light in Cheyenne, Wyoming.
interesting points: The oval shaped light made a full 180 degree turn in about 3-5 seconds., The observation lasted for 2 to 3 minutes., The vapor trails developed from faint and narrow to wider in a short duration., No aircraft or object was visible accompanying the trails., The trails had an unusual pattern with arcs and right angle formations.
sighted object: an oval shaped light and unusual vapor trails
witness description: Ground-radar observation with additional details about vapor trails
